verses.roman:
āsiyā dekhila sabe sei ta kukkure
prabhu-pāśe vasiyāche kichu alpa-dūre

synonyms: āsiyā—coming; dekhila—they saw; sabe—everyone; sei ta kukkure—that very same dog; prabhu-pāśe—near Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; vasiyāche—sat; kichu alpa-dūre—a little bit away from the Lord.
translation: When all the devotees came to the place of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, they saw the same dog was sitting a little apart the Lord.
